'''Dr. Christopher Wright Mitchell''' (October [[1957]]) is the Assistant Professor of Theology and Director of the Marion E. Wade Center at Wheaton College. He has studied and lectured on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] among other similar authors such as [[C.S. Lewis]].
